items.text: much more in control of that, flicked off his pads for four. Too short and punished
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: fuller length, driven to long-on. Not timed that well which means they can run two. This was the over of acceleration Bangladesh needed perhaps, and with that, it's time for Akshay to take you through the last ten
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: full outside off, wristily whips it to the right of long-on
items.shortText: Powell to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: length ball on off, shovelled to long-on
items.shortText: Powell to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: length ball, swings across the line from off stump and gets a thick leading edge to cover where the fielder grabs it at the edge of the circle
items.shortText: Powell to Mahmudullah, OUT

dismissal.text: Mahmudullah c Hetmyer b Powell 30 (51b 3x4 0x6) SR: 58.82

items.text: loses shape as he swings hard and across the line and gets an outside edge to third man
